episodes.synopsis: Classic clips from the "AFV" vaults make otherworldly appearances in this roundup of the clumsy and not-so-clever things people will do for a scare.
episodes.title: Creepy Clips, Safari So Good and You Go, Ghoul!

episodes.synopsis: A Thanksgiving-themed menu of laughs features mishaps with cooked and live turkeys, a flaming birthday cake and a montage of trampoline calamities.
episodes.title: Gobble Gobble, Send in the Cleaning Crew, and Trampoline Trouble

episodes.synopsis: Highlights in this holiday collection include "31 Christmas Falls in 35 Seconds" and a little girl who can't keep her hands off Santa's cookies.
episodes.title: The Jolly Old Fat Man, It's Better to Receive, and Santa Claustrophobic

episodes.synopsis: Spring has sprung with clips ranging from Easter calamities to baseball mishaps -- and a hilarious montage of what happens when insects attack.
episodes.title: Bad Boys, Happy Easter, and Scaredy Cats

episodes.synopsis: The holiday spirit's alive and well in these classic Christmas bloopers involving a tree that topples over and a Santa that falls down the stairs.
episodes.title: Christmas Critters, Everyone's a Kid at Christmas, and Practical Jokes

video.title: America's Funniest Home Videos Kids: Holidazed
video.synopsis: No matter the season, the holidays are supposed to be fun. But only "America's Funniest Home Videos" can make them hilarious.
